issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `increaseUnitCapacity(address,uint256,uint256)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description:
A possible integer underflow exists in the function `decreaseUnitCapacity(address,uint256,uint256)`.
The subtraction may result in a value < 0.
issues.title: Integer Underflow
